text:
The Punjabi Wikipedia (پنجابی ویکیپیڈیا) is the Punjabi language edition of Wikipedia. The Punjabi language is spoken in Punjab region of Pakistan country. It also has the name of Lahnda language. It holds the 84th place in complete list of Wikipedia by articles, with 41,671+ articles in Wikipedia.
It is one of the popular Wikipedia in the country of Pakistan like in the region of Punjab of Pakistan.
